title: Here We Go Round the Mulberry Bush (Classic Books With Holes)
features: In this version of the traditional nursery rhyme, illustrations and lyrics depict a child's busy day.
description: was born in 1960, in the north east of France, in a mountainous area called the Vosges, where she spent her childhood. After gaining a National Diploma in Visual Communication at the School of Decorative Arts in Strasbourg, with a specialisation in children's illustration, she moved to England in 1985.
